name: MegalomaGreg + ShadowHarlequin - Ambitions [SH's hue_seizure remix]
milkdrop_raw:

b1n=0.000

b3x=1.000
b1ed=0.250
wavecode_0_enabled=0
wavecode_0_samples=512
wavecode_0_sep=0
wavecode_0_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_0_bUseDots=0
wavecode_0_bDrawThick=0
wavecode_0_bAdditive=0

wavecode_0_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_0_r=1.000
wavecode_0_g=1.000
wavecode_0_b=1.000
wavecode_0_a=1.000
wave_0_init1=pulse = 0;
wave_0_per_frame1=pulse = if(above(bass*.05,pulse),pulse+.001,pulse-.001);
wave_0_per_frame2=pulse = pulse*above(pulse,0);
wave_0_per_frame3=t1 = pulse;
wave_0_per_point1=x = sqrt(sample*mid*.05);
wave_0_per_point2=y = .5 + (.1+t1)*cos(sample*20);
wavecode_1_enabled=0
wavecode_1_samples=512
wavecode_1_sep=0
wavecode_1_bSpectrum=0

shapecode_1_g=0.510

shapecode_1_border_g=1.000

shapecode_1_border_a=0.100

shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0

shapecode_2_rad=0.10000

shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000

shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000

shapecode_2_g2=1.000

shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=
per_frame_2=//Variables controling the glitch effect////////////////////////////////////////
per_frame_3=decayrate = 0.09;   //How fast the glitch effect decays back to original image
per_frame_4=trebresp = 2.5;    //Level of treb needed for effect to take place
per_frame_5=////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=cdecay = pow(decayrate, 30/fps);
per_frame_8=count = above(treb, trebresp)*1 + (1-above(treb, 3))*count;
per_frame_9=count = count - above(count, cdecay)*cdecay;
per_frame_10=q20=count;
per_frame_11=monitor = q20;
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=ob_size = 0.05 + 0.3*sin(bass);
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=wave_b = if (treb>1.1&mid<=1&bass<=1, abs(0.5+0.1*sin(treb)),0);
per_frame_19=wave_r = if (bass>1.1&mid<=1&treb<=1, abs(0.5+0.1*sin(bass)),0);
per_frame_20=wave_g = if (mid>1.1&bass<=1&trev<=1, abs(0.5+0.1*sin(mid)),0);
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22= 
per_frame_23=
per_frame_24=ob_a = 0.5 + 0.1*sin(my_volume);
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=
per_frame_27=ib_r = (wave_g+wave_b)/2;
per_frame_28=ib_g = (wave_r_wave_b)/2;
per_frame_29=ib_b = (wave_r+wave_g)/2;
per_frame_30=
per_frame_31=cx = 0.5;
per_frame_32=cy = 0.5;
per_frame_33=
per_frame_34=cond_bass = bass>(1+0.1*sin(sqr(bass)));
per_frame_35=cond_treb = treb>(1+0.1*sin(sqr(treb)));
per_frame_36=
per_frame_37=rot1 = 0.1*sin(sqr(bass)+sqr(treb));
per_frame_38=ret1 *= (rot1 - q20);
per_frame_39=
per_frame_40=rot = if (cond_treb, rot1,0);
per_frame_41=rot = if (cond_bass,- rot1, rot);
per_pixel_1=zoom_out = 1 - abs(0.1*sin(ang))*q20;
per_pixel_2=zoom_in = 1 + abs(0.1*sin(ang))*q20;
per_pixel_3=above_part = ( (ang>0) & (treb>1 + abs(0.1*sin(ang))) );
per_pixel_4=below_part = ( (ang<0) & (bass>1 + abs(0.1*sin(ang))) );
per_pixel_5=
per_pixel_6=zoom = if ( above_part | below_part, zoom_in, zoom_out);
per_pixel_7=
per_pixel_8=sx= if (rad>7.07, 1 + abs(0.1*sin(rad)),1);
per_pixel_9=
per_pixel_10=
per_pixel_11=
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{  
warp_3=`    // Really smooth RADIAL BLUR:
warp_4=`    float2 v1 = normalize(uv - 0.5);
warp_5=`    //float2 v1 = float2(3,0);               // or for an aggressive horiz. blur
warp_6=`    //float2 v1 = normalize(uv - 0.5).yx * float2(-1,1) * 2;
warp_7=`    ret   = (  tex2D( sampler_main, uv + texsize.zw*(v1*-4.5) )*0.19
warp_8=`                 + tex2D( sampler_main, uv + texsize.zw*(v1*-1.5) )*0.31
warp_9=`                 + tex2D( sampler_main, uv + texsize.zw*(v1* 1.5) )*0.31
warp_10=`                 + tex2D( sampler_main, uv + texsize.zw*(v1* 4.5) )*0.19
warp_11=`                ) - 0.009;              
warp_12=`ret += (ret * .015);
warp_13=`}
warp_14=` 
comp_1=`float effectamt = 0;
comp_2=`
comp_3=`shader_body
comp_4=`{
comp_5=`uv=abs(frac(uv+.5)-.5) ;
comp_6=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz*-2 +
comp_7=`              GetBlur1(uv)*2 +
comp_8=`              GetBlur2(uv)*2 - 0.7;
comp_9=`    //ret *= 1.2;
comp_10=`//ret *= bass;
comp_11=`
comp_12=`
comp_13=`//effectamt = 10;
comp_14=`//ret = ret * (((treb * effectamt) * uv.x),((mid * effectamt) * uv.y),((bass * effectamt) * uv.x));
comp_15=`
comp_16=`
comp_17=`
comp_18=`
comp_19=`
comp_20=`
comp_21=`
comp_22=`
comp_23=`
comp_24=`    float2 uv2;
comp_25=`
comp_26=`    float4 c = float4(1,0.4,0.15,0.1);
comp_27=`
comp_28=`    uv2 = uv + float2(1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_29=`    float gx1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_30=`    uv2 = uv + float2(-1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_31=`    float gx2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_32=`
comp_33=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,1)*texsize.zw;
comp_34=`    float gy1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_35=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,-1)*texsize.zw;
comp_36=`    float gy2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_37=`
comp_38=`    float3 g = normalize(float3(gx1-gx2, gy1-gy2, 0.14));
comp_39=`
comp_40=`    ret = 0.5 + 0.5*g;
comp_41=`    ret *= saturate(length(ret.xy-0.5)*5);
comp_42=`    ret = ret.xxy;
comp_43=`    ret += 1.15;
comp_44=`    ret *= lerp(ret,ret*(GetBlur3(uv)-GetBlur1(uv)*(treb_att*(treb_att - q20))),pow(hue_shader.xzy,bass_att));
comp_45=`    ret *= ret;
comp_46=`
comp_47=`    //ret *= 1.5; //old gamma effect    
comp_48=`
comp_49=`
comp_50=`
comp_51=`
comp_52=`
comp_53=`
comp_54=`}
